page.title: 04PEOPLE AT WORK
page.content:
There are no factories or large businesses in our villages. Quite a few people work here though in small businesses, in farming or are self-employed.Here are some details of local employment, including part-time work: Brockford Garage Employs 12 Brockford Nurseries Employs 3 Stoke Ash School Employs 9 Electronics firm Employs 2 Public House and Employs 3 Restuarant
Self employed: Electrician, Decorator, Window Cleaner, Builder
Details of other people and their occupations appear on the next three pages.
